export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "
In the adjoining figure, it is given that triangle KLM and triangle NOP are similar triangles. Their side lengths are given as 
\[
	KL = 2 x - 1 cm
\]
\[
	LM = 2x + 2 cm
\]
\[
	KM = 3 x cm
\]
\[
	NP = 6x cm
\]
\[
	PO = 3x + 9 cm
\]
\[
	NO = 18 cm
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline 
\newline

Find \(x\) and calculate the length of all the sides of 2 triangles. \newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 4,
    "step_txt": "$$\text{It is given that $\Delta KLM \sim \Delta NOP $. so, we can write }$$
\[
	\frac{KL }{\input[s1v1]{}\input[s1v2]{}} = \frac{LM }{OP } = \frac{MK }{\input[s1v3]{}\input[s1v4]{}}
\]"
  }, {
    "id": "s2",
    "n_params": 2,
    "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s2v1]{} x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{2x + 2}{3x + 9} = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 x - 1 }{\input[s2v2]{} } = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]"
  }, {
    "id": "s3",
    "n_params": 2,
    "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x - 1 = \input[s3v1]{} 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x = 10.0 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = \input[s3v2]{}
\]"
  }, {
    "id": "s4",
    "n_params": 1,
    "step_txt": "
So, now we can find the sides as
\[
	KL = 2 \times 5 + 1 =\input[s4v1]{} cm
\]"
  }, {
    "id": "s5",
    "n_params": 4,
    "step_txt": "
\[
	LM = 2x + 2 = \input[s5v1]{} cm
\]
\[
	KM = 3 x = \input[s5v2]{} cm
\]
\[
	NP = 6x = \input[s5v3]{} cm
\]
\[
	PO = 3x + 9 = \input[s5v4]{} cm
\]
\[
	NO = 18 cm
\]
\newline

"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": ["N", "O", "P", "N"],
  "text": "$$\text{Since, the ratio of corresponding sides in similar triangle is proportional, therefore, we can write $\frac{KL }{NO } = \frac{LM }{OP } = \frac{MK }{PN }$}$$"
}, {
  "data": [2, 18],
  "text": "$$\text{Putting the values of side's length we get $\frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{2x + 2}{3x + 9} = \frac{3 x }{6x}$, taking terms separately we get $\frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{3 x }{6x}$}$$"
}, {
  "data": [9.0, 5.0],
  "text": "$$\text{Solving for x we get, $x = 5.0$}$$"
}, {
  "data": [11],
  "text": "$$\text{Putting the value of $x$ in $KL$, we get $KL = 2 \times 5 + 1 = 11$ cm }$$"
}, {
  "data": [12, 15, 30, 24],
  "text": "$$\text{Similarly, putting the value of $x$ in $LM$, $KM$, $NP$, $PO$, $NO$ we get $LM = 2x + 2 = 12$ cm, $KM = 3 x = 15$ cm, $NP = 6x = 30 $cm, $PO = 3x + 9 = 24$ cm, $NO = 18$ cm.}$$"
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
In the adjoining figure, it is given that triangle KLM and triangle NOP are similar triangles. Their side lengths are given as 
\[
	KL = 2 x - 1 cm
\]
\[
	LM = 2x + 2 cm
\]
\[
	KM = 3 x cm
\]
\[
	NP = 6x cm
\]
\[
	PO = 3x + 9 cm
\]
\[
	NO = 18 cm
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline 
\newline

Find \(x\) and calculate the length of all the sides of 2 triangles. \newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 4, "step_txt": "$$\text{It is given that $\Delta KLM \sim \Delta NOP $. so, we can write }$$
\[
	\frac{KL }{\input[s1v1]{}\input[s1v2]{}} = \frac{LM }{OP } = \frac{MK }{\input[s1v3]{}\input[s1v4]{}}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s2v1]{} x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{2x + 2}{3x + 9} = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 x - 1 }{\input[s2v2]{} } = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x - 1 = \input[s3v1]{} 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x = 10.0 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = \input[s3v2]{}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
So, now we can find the sides as
\[
	KL = 2 \times 5 + 1 =\input[s4v1]{} cm
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 4, "step_txt": "
\[
	LM = 2x + 2 = \input[s5v1]{} cm
\]
\[
	KM = 3 x = \input[s5v2]{} cm
\]
\[
	NP = 6x = \input[s5v3]{} cm
\]
\[
	PO = 3x + 9 = \input[s5v4]{} cm
\]
\[
	NO = 18 cm
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["N", "O", "P", "N"], "text": "$$\text{Since, the ratio of corresponding sides in similar triangle is proportional, therefore, we can write $\frac{KL }{NO } = \frac{LM }{OP } = \frac{MK }{PN }$}$$"}, {"data": [2, 18], "text": "$$\text{Putting the values of side's length we get $\frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{2x + 2}{3x + 9} = \frac{3 x }{6x}$, taking terms separately we get $\frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{3 x }{6x}$}$$"}, {"data": [9.0, 5.0], "text": "$$\text{Solving for x we get, $x = 5.0$}$$"}, {"data": [11], "text": "$$\text{Putting the value of $x$ in $KL$, we get $KL = 2 \times 5 + 1 = 11$ cm }$$"}, {"data": [12, 15, 30, 24], "text": "$$\text{Similarly, putting the value of $x$ in $LM$, $KM$, $NP$, $PO$, $NO$ we get $LM = 2x + 2 = 12$ cm, $KM = 3 x = 15$ cm, $NP = 6x = 30 $cm, $PO = 3x + 9 = 24$ cm, $NO = 18$ cm.}$$"}]
